General.Name: Zhejiang Jiecang Linear Motion Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Jiecang Linear Motion Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of linear drive products. The company offers linear actuators, servo motors, lifting columns, control boxes, controllers, accessories, and other products. It also provides adjustable bed base, lifting tv base, bath lift, toilet lift, lifting cabinets bases, lifting dresser base, extendable table tops, and top wheelchair systems, as well as standing desk solutions. The company's products are used in office, medical care, home, industrial automation, and kitchen applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Xinchang, China.
